mapper.select: select op.productno, o.orderno, op.oquantity, p.pname, p.pprice, pi.ioriginalname, pi.isavename, pi.imgtype, o.ostatus, o.odate from orders o, orderproducts op, products p, productimgs pi where o.userid=#{userid} and o.orderno = op.orderno and op.productno = p.productno and p.productno = pi.productno and pi.ipriority = 1
mapper.insert: insert into orderproducts (productno, orderno, oquantity) values (#{productno}, #{orderno}, #{oquantity})
mapper.delete: delete from orderproducts where orderno=#{orderno} and productno=#{productno}
